name: Link Duck
text:
3 "Duck" monsters
Once per turn: You can add 1 "Duck" card from your GY to your hand. If this card is targeted by a card effect: You can shuffle a "Duck" card from your GY into the Deck and negate that effect. This card cannot be destroyed by battle. Any card this card points to is treated as a  "Duck" card. If a "Duck" monster is sent from the field to the GY: You can Special Summon a "Duck" Normal Monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Link Duck" once per turn.
